body:
Hi Claudio,

I' am sorry to get back so late.  This week has been busy but I will write a good response this weekend.  This issue seems to be a duplicate:

[http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topic/show?id=2985...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topic/show?id=2985220%3ATopic%3A1231901&xg_source=msg)

-Chris
